content.html:
Now re-reading the question, I think I may have misunderstood it. I'm suggesting we add an enum to ignition::msgs::BatteryState so it is reachable from code. Here's an example. Something like this:

message BatteryState
{
  enum PowerSupplyStatus
  {
    UNKNOWN    = 0;
    ...
  }
  ...
}

Then from C++ this becomes ignition::msgs::BatteryState::PoweSupplyStatus::UNKNOWN
